title: Won promo match but didn't get promoted?
body:
Maybe I'm crazy but I was in my promotion matches having already been given 1 win because I dropped out from bronze IV to Bronze V.  I lost my first match which I believe would have put me at 1-1.  Then I won my next match thinking I got promoted.  I played one more game and realized that it put me back into placements.

Can this be looked at?  Thanks!

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you queue dodged during your promo series, which counts as a loss whenever you're in a series.

I hope this cleared up the confusion! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Ah, now I know, thank you!
